Module roborally
Package client.view

Class PickDamageController

java.lang.Object
client.view.Controller
client.view.PickDamageController
public class PickDamageController
extends Controller
This class represents the innerview of the activation phase for the situation that the player has to pick damage cards because the spam deck is empty. The player has to pick a certain amount of cards of the other damage decks and send his choice back to the server.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ActivationController activationController
    The ActivationController that sets this view as inner view
    private int countSpam
    It saves the actual count of spam cards in the spam deck.

    This Label displays how much cards the player should pick.
    private int pickDamage
    The amount of damage cards the player should pick.
    private java.util.ArrayList<CardType> pickedDamageCards
    This list stores all damage cards that the player chose and gets cleared when one pickDamage pass is over.

    This HBox shows the images of damage cards the player has chosen.

    The Button for choosing a spam card.

    • PickDamageController

      public PickDamageController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()

    • pickDamage

      public void pickDamage​(PickDamage pickDamage)
      By getting protocol PickDamage the damageAnchorPane gets visible and the method updates the count numbers on the different damageButtons, shows how much damage cards the player has to choose and stores the current counts of each damage deck in its class attributes.
      Parameters:
      pickDamage - how much damage cards the player has to select

    • updateDamageCountLabel

      private void updateDamageCountLabel​(CardType cardType)
      This method updates displaying the count of cards each button should represent and disables the buttons if the deck is empty
      Parameters:
      cardType - the CardType the player selected

    • damageButtonClicked

      private void damageButtonClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when one of the four buttons is pressed. Depending on which button this was, the number of cards in the locally stored class attribute that represents this deck is increased and the method checkDamageReady is called with the selected CardType.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the actionEvent which also stores its source

    • checkDamageReady

      private void checkDamageReady​(CardType card)
      This method checks if the player picked as much cards as he should and displays the selected card underneath the buttons. If the player picked enough cards everything related to displaying this class gets reset and the innerView of the activation phase gets changed back to Play It.
      Parameters:
      card - the CardType the player selected

    • setActivationController

      public void setActivationController​(ActivationController activationController)
